get.summary: Searches for devices using the query information provided.

parameters.name: lgid
parameters.description: OrganizationGroup to be searched, user's OG is considered if not sent.

parameters.name: seensince
parameters.description: Specifies the date filter for device search, which retrieves the devices that are seen after this date

parameters.name: sortorder
parameters.description: Sorting order. Values ASC or DESC. Defaults to ASC.

patch.summary: New - Check out the device to enrollment User

put.summary: New - process all the applicable products for a device
put.description: It processes all the applicable products for an input device. Performs necessary checks and updates device product compliance status, views inventory and creates content for the device. Also, updates job statistics.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: device id that needs to be processed by Policy Engine(Required)

parameters.name: fastTrack
parameters.description: fast track flag is to prioritize tasks like install application and intall file actions over other tasks

404.description: 1. {5002 : Device not found for specified id: deviceId}

422.description: 1012 - Unprocessable Entity1. {fastTrack : fastTrack should be boolean}

get.summary: New - gets the device product compliance status
get.description: It returns the device product compliance status e.g. (Unknown, Compliant, NonCompliantInProgress, NonCompliantFailed, NonCompliantTimedOut, NonCompliantMustPush, NonCompliantDependent, NonCompliantOutRank, UndeterminedOffline)

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: product id whose status needs to be returned(Required)

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: device id whose status needs to be returned(Required)

404.description: 1. {5050 : Product not found for specified id: productId}2. {5002 : Device not found for specified id: deviceId}3. {5051 : Compliance Status not found for productId: {productId} and deviceId: {deviceId}}

put.summary: New - process a product for a device
put.description: It processes a product for an input device. Performs necessary checks and updates device product compliance status, views inventory and creates content for the device. Also, updates job statistics.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: product id that needs to be processed by Policy Engine(Required)

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: device id that needs to be processed by Policy Engine(Required)

parameters.name: fastTrack
parameters.description: fast track flag is to prioritize tasks like install application and intall file actions over other tasks

404.description: 1. {5050 : Product not found for specified id: productId}2. {5002 : Device not found for specified id: deviceId}3. {5051 : Compliance Status not found for productId: {productId} and deviceId: {deviceId}}

422.description: 1012 - Unprocessable Entity1. {fastTrack : fastTrack should be boolean}

patch.summary: New - process a product to activate/deactivate for all the applicable devices
patch.description: For activate, It processes the input product for all the devices in assigned smart groups. It also updates device product compliance status and job statistics. For deactivate, It updates the queued jobs of the input product and mark them for deletion. Also, gets the list of delivered jobs for the input product and updates device product job status to be cancelled.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: product id that needs to be processed by Policy Engine(Required)

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: force flag for activate product to decide whether to force reprocess device product job or not

parameters.name: fastTrack
parameters.description: fast track flag is to prioritize tasks like install application and intall file actions over other tasks

404.description: 1. {5050 : Product not found for specified id: productId}

422.description: 1012 - Unprocessable Entity1. {force : force should be boolean}2. {fastTrack : fastTrack should be boolean}3. {operations : only replace is supported}4. {status : status should be boolean}

put.summary: New - process a device for a product Set
put.description: It processes a product set for an input device. Performs necessary checks and updates device product compliance status, views inventory and creates content for the device. Also, updates job statistics.

parameters.name: productSetId
parameters.description: product set id that needs to be processed by Policy Engine(Required)

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: device id that needs to be processed by Policy Engine(Required)

parameters.name: fastTrack
parameters.description: fast track flag is to prioritize tasks like install application and intall file actions over other tasks

404.description: 1. {5051 : ProductSet not found for specified id: productSetId}2. {5002 : Device not found for specified id: deviceId}

422.description: 1012 - Unprocessable Entity1. {fastTrack : fastTrack should be boolean}

put.summary: New - process a product set for all the applicable devices
put.description: It processes the input product set for all the devices in assigned smart groups. It also updates device product compliance status and job statistics.

parameters.name: productSetId
parameters.description: product set id that needs to be processed by Policy Engine(Required)

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: force flag for activate product set to decide whether to force reprocess device product job or not

parameters.name: fastTrack
parameters.description: fast track flag is to prioritize tasks like install application and intall file actions over other tasks

404.description: 1. {5051 : ProductSet not found for specified id: productSetId}

422.description: 1012 - Unprocessable Entity1. {force: force should be boolean}2. {fastTrack : fastTrack should be boolean}

post.summary: Creates an APPLE macOS Device Profile
Creates a Provisioning Enabled QNX Device Profile
Creates a Windows PC Device Profile
Creates a Windows Desktop Device Profile
Creates a Windows Phone Device Profile

put.summary:
Updates an ANDROID Device Profile.
If the CreateNewVersion key is empty or false, a new Profile version will not be created but AssignedSmartGroups, RootLocationGroup, AssignedGeofenceArea and AssignedSchedule will be saved and published.
Else if it's true, new version of the profile will be created and published.

post.summary:
Updates an ANDROID Device Profile.
If the CreateNewVersion key is empty or false, a new Profile version will not be created but AssignedSmartGroups, RootLocationGroup, AssignedGeofenceArea and AssignedSchedule will be saved and published.
Else if it's true, new version of the profile will be created and published.

Else if it's true, new version of the profile will be created and published.

Updates a QNX Device Profile.
If the CreateNewVersion key is empty or false, a new Profile version will not be created but AssignedSmartGroups, RootLocationGroup, AssignedGeofenceArea and AssignedSchedule will be saved and published.

FileName.description: Gets or sets FileName {Will be set in the content-disposition header}

IRequestQuery.description:
Interface for IAwRequestQuery
This will hold all the required data for a request. Will be filled from ModelBinder

QueryParams.description: Gets or sets Query Parameters. For e.g. any query string parameters will be extracted to key,value pair and stored here.

TenantContext.description: Gets or sets IAwTenantContext. Will hold the tenant details, which will be filled as part of the tenant validation handler

RequestMethod.description: Gets or sets RequestMethod. Will be used to write custom rules

AllowedUriQueryChars.description: Gets or sets allowed Characters in Query String.

ITenantContext.description: Contract for TenantContext. Will be exposed from RequestQuery and will be injected to every controller actions and Business method

TenantCode.description: Gets or sets TenantCode. Uniquely identify the tenant for the request

OrganizationgroupId.description: Gets or sets Organization Group ID
